properties.description: Whether the grid will manage the rows amount depending on the available space
properties.name: autofit

properties.description: Property to indicate the entries children
properties.name: childProperty

properties.description: Pixels that will be set as the minimum width of each column
properties.name: columnMinWidth

properties.description: Defines the columns that will be shown in the grid
properties.name: columns

properties.description: Whether the user will be able to edit entry cells or not
properties.name: editable

properties.description: Whether the footer will display the page entries or not
properties.name: entriesCount

properties.description: Whether the footer will be displayed or not
properties.name: footer

properties.description: Defines the headers of the given columns
properties.name: headers

properties.description: Property that sets the id for the entries
properties.name: keyProperty

properties.description: Number of rows to fill the page
properties.name: pageSize

properties.description: Whether the user wants a default pagination or not
properties.name: pagination

properties.description: Whether the user can resize the columns or not
properties.name: resizable

properties.description: Pixels that will be set as the minimum height of each row
properties.name: rowMinHeight

methods.description: Clears the page and resets the entries count
methods.name: _clearPage

methods.description: Handles the cell creation and if the user has specified the grid as editable it will add its corresponding events
methods.name: _createCell

methods.description: Creates the child rows for the given row
methods.name: _createChildRows

methods.description: Creates the pages for the strip page selector
methods.name: _createStripPages

methods.description: Decrease the entries count
methods.name: _decreaseEntriesCount

methods.description: Takes all the source declared by the user and creates its own fragment to save it
methods.name: _generateSourceFragment

methods.description: Searches for rows declared by the user to elaborate our data object and returns it
methods.name: _generateSourceRowsData

methods.description: Gets the current last page depending on the store size
methods.name: _getLastAvailablePage

methods.description: Gets the current rows capacity
methods.name: _getRowsCapacity

methods.description: shows the row childs on autofit grid
methods.name: _handleAutofitRowDropdown

methods.description: Handles the end of the column resize
methods.name: _handleColumnResizeStop

methods.description: Handles the resize of the columns
methods.name: _handleColumnsResize

methods.description: Manages the redirection to another function depending on the situation
methods.name: _handleEntries

params.description: Whether it has to clean the current page or not
params.name: cleanCurrentRange

methods.description: Handles the navigability buttons to be enabled/disabled depending on the situation
methods.name: _handleNavigability

methods.description: Manages the redirection to another function depending on the situation
methods.name: _handleRange

params.description: Whether it has to clean the current page or not
params.name: cleanCurrentRange

methods.description: shows the row childs
methods.name: _handleRowDropdown

methods.description: Handles everything autofit rows related, the paginations, its sizes...
methods.name: _handleRowsLayout

methods.description: Manages the redirection to another function depending on the situation
methods.name: _handleSort

methods.description: Increases the entries count
methods.name: _increaseEntriesCount

methods.description: Called from the navigation buttons to navigate through the pages
methods.name: _navigate

methods.description: First action when clicking to resize, sets up some information and actions before the actual resize function is called when moving the mouse
methods.name: _resizeColumn

methods.description: Selects a page
methods.name: _selectPage

methods.description: Check if the default element style should be applied
methods.name: _setDefaultStyle

methods.description: Sets up the autofit boolean depending on the situation
methods.name: _setupAutofit

methods.description: Sets up the columns and its css rule
methods.name: _setupColumns

methods.description: Depending on what the user provided with the grid we will set up our store with the data we have
methods.name: _setupContent

methods.description: Sets up the grid footer
methods.name: _setupFooter

methods.description: Creation of the headers and its attributes
methods.name: _setupHeaders

methods.description: Sets up basic properties for the misc object
methods.name: _setupMisc

methods.description: Creates the overlay that will be used when resizing columns
methods.name: _setupOverlay

methods.description: Setting up the rows size type depending on the user input
methods.name: _setupPageSize

methods.description: Sets up the page selector to navigate through the pages
methods.name: _setupPagination

methods.description: Creates some fast access elements so that theres no need for calling the QuerySelector all the time.
methods.name: _setupRefs

methods.description: Creates a resize listener for the grid resize
methods.name: _setupResize

methods.description: Creates the store that will handle all the grid data
methods.name: _setupStore

methods.description: Redirects the sort call depending on the situation, it also toggles the icon
methods.name: _sort

methods.description: Updates strip page selector
methods.name: _updateCurrentPage

methods.description: Resets all the sorted headers, it does nothing in the clicked header
methods.name: _updateHeaders

methods.description: Updates pageSelectors and the navigability buttons
methods.name: _updatePagination

methods.description: Creates the cell events for the user edition
methods.name: assignEditableEvents
